author: SkinnyTaste
name: Sweet Potato Turkey Meatloaf

ingredients.notes: divided (for whole30, use sugar free such as Primal Kitchen)

instructions: Preheat the oven to 350F. Remove flesh from sweet potato, discard skin and mash in a large bowl. Add turkey, egg, dried onion, 1/4 cup ketchup, marjoram and 1 teaspoon kosher salt, and mix with the ground turkey using a fork until mixed well. In a small bowl combine 2 tablespoons of the ketchup with Worcestershire sauce. Shape into a loaf and place on a baking sheet. Spoon sauce on top. Bake uncovered for 55 minutes, remove from oven and let it sit for 5 minutes before slicing.
